text: % Incoordination 90% Muscular hypotonia 90% Optic atrophy 90% Peripheral neuropathy 90% Sensorineural hearing impairment 90% Visual impairment 90% Muscle weakness 50% Respiratory insufficiency 50% Pancreatic fibrosis 7.5% Hyperreflexia 5% Absent speech - Areflexia - Ataxia - Death in infancy - Drooling - Dysphagia - Growth delay - Hearing impairment - Immunodeficiency - Intellectual disability - Neonatal hypotonia - Nystagmus - Progressive muscle weakness - Recurrent infections - Recurrent upper
